item.description:
What: Wikipedia Meetup
Date and Time: Monday, March 13, 6:30 pm
Location: Veggie Planet/Club Passim, 47 Palmer Street, Harvard Square, 617-492-5300

This event will be a bit different from our regular meeting; definitely jazzy. Stick around afterwards to hear Eden & Larry perform at Club Passim at 8 pm in New England Fiddles: http://www.clubpassim.... The music, separate from our gathering, costs $10 for nonmembers and $5 for Club Passim members. They're some of the best fiddlers in the country, and definitely worth it.

Before the music, we will talk about Wiki Wednesdays, wiki hacking, Wikipedia, and Wikimania this August.

Please join us!

Come one, come all ! Bring friends, loved ones, purple unicorns...

For more information, see http://en.wikipedia.o...
item.name: The Boston Wikipedia March Meetup
